subNode:value.scalar:string: Adds an image slider to your homepage.
homeslider` ( `id_homeslider_slides` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_shop` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_homeslider_slides`, `id_shop`) ) ENGINE=

homeslider_slides` ( `id_homeslider_slides` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `position` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id_homeslider_slides`) ) ENGINE=

homeslider_slides_lang` ( `id_homeslider_slides` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_lang` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `legend` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `image` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_homeslider_slides`,`id_lang`) ) ENGINE=
